verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paramunundi boora dwanito arayu nesu arbhatamuto Sarvalokamu terichuchunu twarapadu O priyundaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gurutulella dharaniyandu sariga chuda jaruguchunda Chirunavvuto chera prabhuni twarapadu O priyundaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristunandu mrutalellaru kadaboora mrogagane kresthu Vale tirigi leturu letuva ? neevu priyudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Arayanga parisuddulu murisedaru akashaya dehulai Paramandu prabhu kristu niratamu O priyundaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Karunaleni O maranama nirathamu neeku jayamaguna Marana samha rundesu twaraga raanai yunnaadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maamsaloka pishaachaadulu himsaparacha vijrumbinchina Leshamainanu jadiyakumu aashatho kaachukonumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papamunu cheyakuma repakuma daiva kopamunu Shaapamunu thappukoni shraddatho kaachukonumaa{/lang-eng}
